title: Importance of Semantic HTML
contents: Using semantic HTML syntax is important for so many reasons. Firstly, it helps organize your code. Secondly, it helps the browswer and search engines read your content correctly.

title: When to Use a Ternary Operator
contents: Are you tired of writing multiple lines of code? You can cut down on your else/if statements by using  the shorthand form known as a ternary operator! The syntax looks something like this: condition ? exprIfTrue : exprIfFalse

title: What to do When you Need to Learn a Code Concept Quickly
contents: Youtube has a vast selection of content creators with thousands of hours of useful coding information from html, CSS, javaScript, Js frameworks and libraries.
